byline.original: By DAVID JOLLY and STEPHEN CASTLE

abstract: France and Belgium moved on Tuesday to shore up Dexia as fears increased that the bank’s exposure to Greek sovereign debt could lead to its collapse.
snippet: France and Belgium moved on Tuesday to shore up Dexia as fears increased that the bank’s exposure to Greek sovereign debt could lead to its collapse.
lead_paragraph: PARIS — France and Belgium moved on Tuesday to shore up Dexia as fears increased that the bank’s exposure to Greek sovereign debt could lead to its collapse.

headline.main: France and Belgium to Guarantee Dexia
